name: Giant's Kettle
description:
Giant's Kettle is a top down roguelike dungeon crawling game where the player delves into a cave while fighting through waves of enemies. 

The game has a new kind of rune/item system where the player finds equipment by killing enemies and unlocks new runes after each level up.

The game has four different difficulties. 

The game was made as a school project.
Group members:
Max Kaarla(Enemy and player base code, inventory, lighting and special effects)
Miika Haukkala(Prosedural map generation, animations and base gameplay loop)
Anna Ying(player and enemy art and some item art)
Kerttu Kautto(Setting up the tilemap and some item art)
Joa Lampela(Runes and abilities)
Jarno Tiainen(Sound design)

Source code: https://github.com/JoaLampela/Giants-Kettle
